General.Name: Fong Chien Construction Co Ltd
General.Description: Fong-Chien Construction Co.,LTD., together with its subsidiaries, engages in construction business in Taiwan. It also engages in the rental and sale of commercial buildings; trading of construction materials; import and export business; real estate trading, residential and building development and leasing, etc.; and operation of restaurants and catering business. The company was formerly known as Hongdu Construction Co., Ltd. Fong-Chien Construction Co.,LTD. was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.
